participant_1.background:
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i like to go fishing.
this season , i will become a playoff quarterback.
My mother is in the hospital and I'm reading 1984 to distract myself from the pain.
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.

participant_2.background:
I try new things to expand my horizons and keep my mind active.
i am studying software development.
i own my company.
i am a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date!

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
I'm doing great, thank you for asking! What about you?
I'm doing okay, thanks. I'm just reading 1984 right now, and it's really good.
Oh, I've heard great things about that book! I've been meaning to read it, but I haven't gotten around to it yet.
You should definitely check it out, it's a really interesting book.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to try new things to keep my mind active. I'm currently studying software development, and I also own my own company.
Oh, that's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to code, but I'm not very good at it.
It's definitely not easy, but it's a lot of fun!
I'm sure it is. So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm going to a Renaissance Faire with my date! I'm really excited to show her my new outfit.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I've never been to a Renaissance Faire before.
You should definitely go sometime, they're a lot of fun!
I will, thanks for the recommendation
